content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: bookshelf
inventory=[{"type": "music_disc_far", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "granite_stairs", "quantity": 50, "index": 13}, {"type": "spruce_sapling", "quantity": 46, "index": 17}, {"type": "gravel", "quantity": 29, "index": 21}, {"type": "book", "quantity": 3, "index": 27}, {"type": "light_blue_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "nautilus_shell", "quantity": 48, "index": 30}, {"type": "dark_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "blue_concrete", "quantity": 19, "index": 37}, {"type": "acacia_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "dead_brain_coral", "quantity": 3, "index": 39}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 42}]

thought: To craft a bookshelf I need to place three books on top of three planks. The only way to get planks is to convert logs or wood into planks. I have dark oak wood and acacia wood. I'll start with the acacia wood because I only need one log/wood to make enough planks for this recipe.
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: bookshelf
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "dark_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "music_disc_far", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "granite_stairs", "quantity": 50, "index": 13}, {"type": "spruce_sapling", "quantity": 46, "index": 17}, {"type": "gravel", "quantity": 29, "index": 21}, {"type": "book", "quantity": 3, "index": 27}, {"type": "light_blue_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "nautilus_shell", "quantity": 48, "index": 30}, {"type": "blue_concrete", "quantity": 19, "index": 37}, {"type": "acacia_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "dead_brain_coral", "quantity": 3, "index": 39}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 42}]
thought: I have crafted the dark oak planks. I need to move them to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

Ok
